title: PlayStation 5's Big Update: Everything We've Asked For? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.28.22
description:
Blessing and Snowbike Mike talk PS5's latest big update, Mario Kart 8 Deluxe DLC wave 2, and Phil Spencer being excited for God of War Ragnarok.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:03 - Housekeeping

A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now and it’s the crew talking about Star Wars Knights of The Old Republic and if there could be a new hope. That’s up on youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Annapurna Interactive is having a showcase this afternoon so in the middle of our stream after this, Mike, Andy, and myself will be reacting! If you’re watching live just continue to watch us here for the reactions but if not, you can catch it later on YouTube.com/KindaFunnyGames


The Roper Report  -

00:10:35 - PS5’s getting a nice big update!
00:26:47 - Backbone has been announced as the first official PlayStation-friendly iPhone controller
00:38:03 - Ad
00:39:53 - Grounded 1.0 has a release date!
00:47:20 - Mario Kart 8 Deluxe’s second wave of DLC has been revealed
00:54:59 - Phil Spencer’s most anticipated game is God of War Ragnarok
00:58:39 - Out today
01:02:53 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Bless & Tam
